message.name: ERR_FV_ISSUE_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: Only issues which have a status of open can be closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_CLOSURE_REASON_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Close reason code must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CLOSURE_RESOLUTION_ADDED
message.locale: An issue can only be closed if a resolution has not been added yet.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: This case cannot be modified as it is already closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The case start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PRIORITY_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The priority must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: The case end date must not be earlier than the case start date.

message.name: ERR_CASE_SECURITY_MAINTAIN_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this issue.

message.name: ERR_CASE_SECURITY_READ_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this issue.

message.name: ERR_CASE_SECURITY_APPROVE_RESOLUTION
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to approve this resolution.

message.name: ERR_CASE_SECURITY_REJECT_RESOLUTION
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to reject this resolution.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESOLUTION_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: A resolution already exists for this issue. Please modify the existing resolution.

message.name: ERR_RV_RESOLUTION_STATUS_NOT_INEDIT
message.locale: Resolution cannot be modified. Only resolutions with a status of in-edit can be modified.

message.name: INF_NO_RESOLUTIONS_EXIST
message.locale: Resolutions do not exist for this type of issue. Please contact your administrator

message.name: ERR_RV_APPROVE_RESOLUTION_STATUS_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Resolution cannot be approved. Only resolutions with a status of submitted can be approved.

message.name: ERR_RV_REJECT_RESOLUTION_STATUS_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Resolution cannot be rejected. Only resolutions with a status of submitted can be rejected.

message.name: ERR_FV_REJECTIONREASON_EMPTY
message.locale: Rejection reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RESOLUTION_MODIFY_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: A resolution cannot be modified on a closed issue.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RESOLUTION_ADD_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: Resolution must not be added to a closed issue.

message.name: ERR_FV_RELATED_CASE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an issue the related case must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_PARTICIPANT_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an issue a participant must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_ISSUE_CONFIGURATION_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an issue the issue configuration of the relevant type of issue must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an issue a start date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_IN_THE_FUTURE
message.locale: Start Date must be today or a day in the past.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_BEFORE_ISSUE_START_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be before the start date of this issue type.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_BEFORE_RELATED_CASE_START_DATE
message.locale: Start date cannot be before the start date of the case on which this issue was identified.

message.name: ERR_FV_END_DATE_INVALID
message.locale: To create an issue the end date must not be earlier than the case start date.

message.name: ERR_FV_EVIDENCE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an issue at least one piece of evidence must be specified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_CLOSED_ISSUE
message.locale: A closed issue cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_MORE_THAN_ONE_IN_EDIT_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot view the 'In Edit' record as more than one 'In Edit' record exists.

message.name: ERR_MORE_THAN_ONE_ACTIVE_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot view the 'Active' record as more than one 'Active' record exists.

message.name: ERR_MORE_THAN_ONE_CANCELED_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot view the 'Cancelled' record as more than one 'Cancelled' record exists.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_ALREADY_ADDED
message.locale: The selected evidence has already been added to the issue. Please select another evidence record.

message.name: ERR_MANUAL_ISSUE_PROSPECT_PERSON
message.locale: An Issue Case cannot be created for a Prospect Person. Please register the Prospect Person as a Person.
